name: PLAZLE
description:
A cyberpunk puzzle platformer which crosses the jigsaw puzzle genre with action platforming. You are presented with a ‘broken world’ which must be fixed by re-arranging the pieces in the correct order. You must also navigate the world  collecting keycard shards which cause a tear to appear in the fabric of reality. You can only exit through this tear once the world is in order.

There are also enemies that will try to harm you as well as various deadly environmental obstacles. You cannot shoot or even fight but must use the changing world to defeat enemies.
